rules_text:
When Cloven Forms enters, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{5}{G}{G}{G}, Exile Cloven Forms: Put a creature card from or hand or command zone onto the battlefield. Create a token that's a copy of it, except the token isn't legendary.
flavor_text: [i]“We'd like to know a little bit about you for our files, and to help you learn to help yourself.”[/i]
